subsections.title: 1.1 Personal Data
subsections.content: Planix does not directly collect your personal information such as your name, address, or phone number. The only identifying data comes from your Google account when you sign in to enable backup on Google Drive (email address, user ID, Drive permissions). This information is neither shared, sold, nor stored on any third-party server.

subsections.title: 1.2 Local Data
subsections.content: The app stores your events, display preferences, backup history, and statistics locally on your device. This data never leaves your device.

subsections.title: 1.3 Backup Data
subsections.content: If you choose to back up on Google Drive, Planix creates a private folder in your Drive and saves your encrypted backups there. The app only has access to these files, and you can delete them at any time.

sections.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
sections.content: Data is used solely to record, restore, and synchronize your events, manage your preferences, and perform Drive backups. No data is shared for advertising or analytics purposes.

sections.title: 3. Data Storage and Security
sections.content: Local data is securely stored on your device. Google Drive backups are protected by OAuth 2.0. Planix does not transmit any data to its own servers.

sections.title: 4. Google Authentication
sections.content: Planix uses Google Sign-In to verify your identity and obtain Drive permissions. No sensitive data (passwords or access tokens) is retained.

sections.title: 5. Themes and Personalization
sections.content: Your theme (light/dark) and language preferences are stored only locally on your device.

sections.title: 6. Languages
sections.content: Planix is available in French and English. No language data is sent to any external server.

sections.title: 7. Local Statistics
sections.content: Charts and histories are generated locally from your own data. No usage data is collected.

sections.title: 8. Your Rights
sections.content: You can delete your local data, remove your Planix files from Google Drive, and revoke Planix permissions in your Google account at any time.

sections.title: 9. Contact
sections.content: For any questions or privacy-related requests, contact us at donaldnkouathio@gmail.com.

sections.title: 10. Changes to This Policy
sections.content: Any changes will be published on this page with a new update date. We encourage you to review it regularly.

sections.title: 11. Consent
sections.content: By using Planix, you agree to this privacy policy.
